螸螸螸

螸字的基本解释

螸
yú
腹部膏腴下垂。
古书上说的一种虫。

螸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yú］
［《廣韻》羊朱切，平虞，以。］
蜂、螽之类腹部肥腴下垂貌。

螸字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螸； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1095第10
【唐韻】羊朱切【集韻】弋朱切，?音兪。【爾雅·釋蟲】蠭醜螸。【疏】螸，垂腴也。腴，卽腹下也。【說文長箋】猶釋典言流出穢惡也。　又【集韻】兪玉切，音欲。義同。　或作?。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋蟲】【疏】螸，垂腴也，卽腹下也。〕　謹照原文卽腹上增腴字。
螸字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
螸字的起名意思

暂无。

Squat
Basic explanation of words
Squat
yú
The abdomen is plump and drooping.
A kind of insect mentioned in ancient books.
Squat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yú］
["Guangyun" Yang Zhuqie, Pingyu, to. ]
The abdomen of bees and katydids is plump and drooping.
Squat
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螸; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1095 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Sheep Zhu cut [Ji Yun] Yi Zhu cut,? Yin 兪. 【Erya·Release insects】Zhong Ugly. 【Sparse】Cut, plump. It's flamboyant, but also under the abdomen. [Said Wen Changjian] It is still ugly and evil to explain the classics.　[Jiyun] Yuyu cut, sound desire. The same meaning.　Or make?. Textual research: [[Erya·Shu Chong] [Sparse] 螸, 荽腴間,卽卽卽間間卽〕 　 I would like to add the word "flamboyant" on the belly according to the original text.
